paper_abstract: In this research an algebraic fuzzy equation of degree n with crisp coefficients and fuzzy variable has been introduced and presented an iterative method to find the fuzzy roots of it, numerically. An algorithm also has been presented to generate a sequence that can be converged to the root of an algebraic fuzzy equation.
paper_title: An iterative Gauss-Newton method to solve an algebraic fuzzy equation with crisp coefficients
